TEXT.S:
milimulak
u sulit nu Hulam: sapibetik a kamu nu Sakizayap.170~171 ipabaway a di'tu amin / mudadiw kami tu nikanamuhan namu a dadiw / maydih paaninen kami tu mulcekay nu nipasepi / i mahiniay a demiaday / mahinitu caay kalawpes ku limulak ku sepi ku kapah / di'tu aw / izaw tu kuni patungus niyam tu matumesay/ anipatahka na pasepian kina tademaw nu luma' amin/ zakecen tu ku kapah atu limulak ku nikauzip/ adasay limulak ku pulecuhan isu a demiad! ! kukay! pipada'su nu misu i takuwan.
masatekeday a sulitlimulak / ipabaway / mudadiw / paaninen / mulcekay / nipasepi / patungus / zakecen /
